name: The Greatest Adventure of Cyberpunk
description:
THE GREATEST ADVENTURE OF CYBERPUNK

THE WORLD OF 2077 IS IN TROUBLE.

A GREAT HACKER KNOWN AS APOCALYPSE IS TRYING TO DOMINATE THE MIND OF THE PEOPLE THROUGH A NETWORK CALLED TROLLTRIX,

YOUR DUTY IS TO STOP THIS DIABOLICAL PLAN USING ALL YOUR STRENGTH.

CONTROLS:

A - LEFT

D  - RIGHT

SPACE - JUMP

MOUSE BUTTON 1 - ATTACK 1

MOUSE BUTTON 2 - ATTACK 2

THIS GAME WAS DEVELOPED BY: ART AND ANIMATION:

FELIPE MARTINI

ALEXANDRE TRINDADE

RICARDO PISTORELLO

CODE AND LEVEL DESIGN:

RICARDO PISTORELLO

SOUND AND MUSIC:

MOYSES ALENCAR DE CARVALHO - YOU CAN CHECK OUT HIS WORK HERE. http://rainbug.com.br/

THANKS FOR PLAYING.

CYBERPUNK GAMEJAM 2014
